articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: Edd Straw's 2024 Australian Grand Prix F1 driver rankings - The Race
articles.description: Who made the best of the Australian Grand Prix's surprise twists and who contributed to the messiness? Here's Edd Straw's judgement on the Formula 1 field's Melbourne performances
articles.content: With a Ferrari 1-2, Red Bull woe, a Mercedes on its side on the final lap and a penalty for a dangerous driving for a double champion, the Australian Grand Prix was by far the most eventful of the 20… [+11424 chars]
